comments:
I200311192030,
from clean workspace, import all plugins, log into dev.eclipse.org/home/eclipse with my 
username/password and extssh.
click on 'HEAD', see 'pending..' with a right arrow. after a short while, right arrow disappears, no 
children can be seen under node 'HEAD', and the following message appears in my .log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.cvs.ui 4 0 Nov 20, 2003 09:12:40.768
!MESSAGE Internal error
!STACK 1
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.connection.CVSServerException: The server reported an error 
while performing the "cvs update" command.
        at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFolderMemberFetcher.performErrorCheck(Rem
oteFolderMemberFetcher.java:166)
        at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFolderMemberFetcher.fetchMembers(RemoteF
olderMemberFetcher.java:88)
        at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFolderMemberFetcher.fetchMembers(RemoteF
olderMemberFetcher.java:73)
        at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.FetchMembersOperation.execute(FetchMembersOperati
on.java:111)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.CVSOperation.run(CVSOperation.java:127)
        at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.model.CVSTagElement.fetchDeferredChildren(CVSTagElement.java:
112)
        at 
org.eclipse.ui.progress.DeferredTreeContentManager$2.run(DeferredTreeContentManager.java:
153)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:62)
Does this happen every time on the Mac?

The problem was that Chris entered the wrong repository path. In this case, he 
should have recieved an error message stating this. For extssh, the connection 
validation in the New Location dialog only validates the connection info (the 
proper error message is displayed for pserver). Also, the exception in the log 
is misleading, tus masking the true problem (which was also in the log as a 
single line).

Downgrading severity (Chris, if you feel that it is more severe, please 
adjust).
Code was added in 3.1 to show the error

traces.message: The server reported an error  while performing the "cvs update" command.
